item.title: Building a Store Finder
item.description: In this post we’ll be creating a web-based store finder using Cloudant. A user visits your website and wants to know which of your branches is closest to their current location. Photo by Sherzod Max on Unsplash To build this need a search index that can sort search results by distance but first, we need a database of branches.
